for i in range(int(input())):
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = min(l)
    b = max(l)
    sum = 0
    for i in l:
        sum += i
    c = sum - a - b
    x = a * (c - 1) * (b - 2)
    y = x % (7 + 10 ** 9)
    print(y)

def soln(abc):
    mod = 10 ** 9 + 7
    (a, b, c) = sorted(abc)
    res = a * (b - 1) % mod
    res = res * (c - 2) % mod
    return res
for _ in range(int(input())):
    abc = list(map(int, input().split()))
    print(soln(abc))

def fun(a, b, c, p):
    if min(a, b) <= c:
        return min(a, b) * (c - 1) % p
    return (min(a, b) - 1) * c % p
t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (N1, N2, N3) = input().split()
    P = 1000000007
    N1 = int(N1)
    N2 = int(N2)
    N3 = int(N3)
    print((P + N1 % P * (N2 % P) % P * (N3 % P) % P - min(N1, min(N2, N3)) % P - (P + fun(N1, N2, N3, P)) % P - (P + fun(N2, N3, N1, P)) % P - (P + fun(N1, N3, N2, P)) % P) % P)
    t = t - 1

def fun(a, b, c, p):
    if min(a, b) <= c:
        return min(a, b) * (c - 1) % p
    return (min(a, b) - 1) * c % p
t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (N1, N2, N3) = input().split()
    P = 1000000007
    N1 = int(N1)
    N2 = int(N2)
    N3 = int(N3)
    print((P + N1 % P * (N2 % P) % P * (N3 % P) % P - min(N1, min(N2, N3)) % P - (P + fun(N1, N2, N3, P)) % P - (P + fun(N2, N3, N1, P)) % P - (P + fun(N1, N3, N2, P)) % P) % P)
    t = t - 1

    for i in range(3):
        ans = ans * (list1[i] - i) % m
    print(ans)

mod = 10 ** 9 + 7

def solve():
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    ans = 1
    a = arr[0]
    a %= mod
    a *= arr[1] - 1
    a %= mod
    a *= arr[2] - 2
    a %= mod
    print(a)
t = int(input())
while t != 0:
    solve()
    t -= 1

for _ in range(int(input())):
    a = []
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    a.sort()
    print(a[0] * (a[1] - 1) * (a[2] - 2) % 1000000007)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = list(map(int, input().split()))
    mod = 10 ** 9 + 7
    n.sort()
    t_1 = n[0]
    for i in range(1, 3):
        t_1 %= mod
        t_1 *= n[i] - i
    print(t_1 % mod)

from functools import reduce
m = 10 ** 9 + 7
t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    lst = list(map(int, input().split()))
    lst.sort()
    lst[2] = lst[2] - 2
    lst[1] = lst[1] - 1
    ans = reduce(lambda x, y: x * y, lst)
    print(ans % m)
    t -= 1
